thread.title: Encounter underway between security forces & terrorists in Bandipora district of J&K |
thread.title_full: Encounter underway between security forces & terrorists in Bandipora district of J&K |

title: Encounter underway between security forces & terrorists in Bandipora district of J&K |
text:
Encounter underway between security forces & terrorists in Bandipora district of J&K Bandipora encounter: 9 soldiers injured & 1 terrorist killed in gunfight By: ABP News Bureau | Last Updated: Tuesday, 14 February 2017 9:43 AM Armymen during encounter in Bandipora/ Image courtesy: ANI 
New Delhi: 9 Indian soldiers got severely injured and 1 terrorist was gunned down in an encounter in Hajin area of Bandipora district in Jammu and Kashmir on Tuesday. 

The incident took place when security forces launched a search operation in Parraypora village after getting information about holed-up militants. The militants opened fire leading to the gunfight, the police said. Image courtesy: ANI 
Recently, four militants, two army personnel and a civilian were killed in a fierce gunfight in the wee hours at a hideout shared by the banned LeT and Hizbul Mujahideen in a village in south Kashmir. 

The encounter killing of the four local militants set off a violent protest by the villagers following which the army opened fire causing injuries to 15 civilians, one of whom later died. 

Acting on specific technical and human intelligence about the presence of militants, security forces swooped down on their hideout at Nagbal village, 70 km south of Srinagar and engaged them in an encounter, leading to their killing. 
(With inputs from PTI) First Published: Tuesday, 14 February 2017 7:15 AM 0 0 Related Stories
